comment: If you want to manage information effectively, then ORM is the way to go.
Model-View-View-Controller is another structural paradigm for your code.
I could spend days messing around with ORM. Yours truly, a Data Tragic
You need to get clued up on SQL language to get the most out of ORM.
Did not realise there was a 'difference between authentication and authorisation', thanks for sharing.
You might want to look into hashing and salting to improve security of personal data.
